TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks 您建立的事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties>事件，以自訂設定檔屬性值的驗證方式。 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties>使用者設定設定檔屬性時，會引發事件。 如果驗證失敗的任何屬性值，會將它們新增至集合中<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A>屬性。 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.SetPropertiesForCurrentUser%2A>方法會傳回在集合<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A>屬性，如此您就可以判斷哪些屬性驗證失敗。
## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties>事件。 值傳遞給`FirstName`屬性是空的或是`null`，則`FirstName`屬性會加入至<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A>集合。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService/vb/Global.asax#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FailedProperties As Collection(Of String)

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: 取得集合，包含驗證失敗的設定檔屬性。
Docs.value: 驗證失敗的設定檔屬性。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A>屬性包含驗證失敗的屬性名稱的集合。 如果您建立的事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties>事件，您會新增至集合中的驗證失敗的屬性名稱<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A>屬性。 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.SetPropertiesForCurrentUser%2A>方法會傳回在集合<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A>屬性，如此您就可以判斷哪些屬性驗證失敗。
## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties>事件。 值傳遞給`FirstName`屬性是空的或是`null`，則`FirstName`屬性會加入至<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A>集合。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService/vb/Global.asax#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Properties As IDictionary(Of String, Object)
public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^> ^ Properties { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^> ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: 取得要驗證的設定檔屬性名稱和值的集合。
Docs.value: 要驗證的設定檔屬性名稱和值。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.Properties%2A>屬性會傳回<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>物件，其中包含的名稱和使用者設定的設定檔屬性的值。 如果您建立的事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties>事件，您可以擷取屬性，以驗證從<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.Properties%2A>屬性。 如果驗證失敗的任何值，將它們加入<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A>屬性。 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.SetPropertiesForCurrentUser%2A>方法會傳回在集合<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A>屬性，如此您就可以判斷哪些屬性驗證失敗。
## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties>事件。 值傳遞給`FirstName`屬性是空的或是`null`，則`FirstName`屬性會加入至<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A>集合。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService/vb/Global.asax#1)]
